with todays society ripping itselt to bits over religion and mass killings and threats to the british way of life. even british police and the armed forces are being killed and threatened in our own country the only way to try and control extremism in schools is to ban it like america has.when i hear pupils of church of england schools being taught the wrong values according to certain religions then its time for religion to go from the ciriculum.
Enough is known about the real explanation of this world,solar system and universe that it PROVES all religion doesnt exist.there are NO gods or any deities of any and all religions.even the elusive Higgs-Boson has been found. so surly this should be the only explanation of our existance taught.its all to do with where we are in the milky way.thank you.
